title: What are the instructions for individual preparation in the Catena group, and how do they relate to natural phenomena and symbols?
first_phrase: This text is about an initiatory group that emphasizes personal development through individual efforts. The group encourages their members to work on themselves before attending meetings, in order to contribute actively to the group's goals. The last 200 tokens describe instructions for individual preparation, which include developing an understanding of natural phenomena, training the mind to concentrate on dynamic symbols, and strengthening the sense of continuity and self-awareness in one's daily life. The text mentions "CATFNA 39" and "contemplations" of the symbols of the "sun" and the "mountain" given in volume I, chapter II. These exercises help remove obstacles to personal growth and prepare the members for higher initiation.
content: INDIRIZZI INDIVIDUALI DI PREPARAZIONE. Tendono a questo scopo: 1. Il destare un grado di intelligenza verso i feno meni naturali, tanto da prolungare al di fuori, ritmica mente, il senso del vivere. Ci si fermerà, per ora, al fe nomeno-base del succedersi del giorno e della notte. 1. L'addestrare la mente alla concentrazione dina mica, consistente nel tracciamento e nella proiezione, intorno a sé, di figure e dí simboli. 2. L'addestrare lo spirito alla fissità. 3. Il rafforzare nel corso della propria vita quoti diana il senso della continuità e della presenza a sé. 1) Per il primo punto, saranno praticate le contem plazioni, prima di dormire e appena desti, coi simboli del « sole » e del « monte », già date nel voi. I, cap. H, pp. 67-68. Là dove la luce esteriore declina, sorge quella interiore.
last_phrase: In conclusion, individual techniques such as practicing contemplation, concentrating on symbols and training the mind and spirit can help to increase our understanding of the natural world, improve concentration and develop a sense of continuity and presence. By following the instructions provided, such as using the symbols of the "sun" and "mountain" before sleeping and upon waking, one can learn to control their thoughts and maintain a sense of calm, both before and during sleep.
